meanings.sent1: The nether part of the tree trunk was covered in moss.
meanings.sent2: The miner explored the nether regions of the cave.
meanings.sent3: The cat's nether paws got wet when it stepped in a puddle.
meanings.sent4: The nether side of the mountain was shrouded in mist.
meanings.sent5: The nether floor of the ocean is home to unique creatures.

meanings.sent1: The nether shelf held older books that were rarely read.
meanings.sent2: The nether branches of the tree struggled to reach the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The nether team members were often overlooked for promotions.
meanings.sent4: The nether clouds in the sky seemed darker and heavier.
meanings.sent5: The nether part of the painting was less detailed than the rest.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the underworld.
meanings.sent1: The nether creatures in the story lurked in the shadows.
meanings.sent2: The nether realm was said to be ruled by dark forces.
meanings.sent3: The nether party theme included spooky decorations.
meanings.sent4: The nether gates creaked open to reveal a mysterious path.
meanings.sent5: The nether music playing added an eerie atmosphere to the scene.
